mapper.select: select br.brief_id, br.bestek_id, br.brief_nr, br.inschrijf_d, br.betreft, br.in_aard_id, br.in_d, br.in_stuk_d, br.in_referte, br.in_bijlage, br.in_type_id, br.uit_aard_id, br.uit_d, br.uit_referte, br.uit_bijlage, br.uit_type_id, br.uit_type_id_vos, br.commentaar, br.ltst_wzg_user_id, br.ltst_wzg_d, br.volgnummer, br.auteur_id, br.dms_id, br.dms_filename, br.dms_folder, br.categorie_id, br.reactie_d, br.reactie_voor_d, br.parent_brief_id, br.qr_code, br.teprinten_jn, br.print_d, -- br.adres_id, a.naam adres_naam, a.voornaam adres_voornaam, a.straat adres_straat, a.gemeente adres_gemeente, br.contact_id, ac.NAAM contact_naam, -- br.dossier_id, d.dossier_nr dossier_nr, d.dossier_type dossier_type_ivs, d.doss_hdr_id dossier_hdr_ivs, d.dossier_b dossier_b_ivs, d.dossier_id_boa, d.nis_id, -- sv.vordering_id, case when sv.AFGEKEURD_JN = 'J' then 'J' when exists (select vordering_id from art46.SCHULDVORDERING_SAP_PROJECT ssp where sv.vordering_id = ssp.vordering_id) then 'J' else 'N' end as vordering_definitief_jn from art46.brief br left join art46.adres a on br.adres_id = a.adres_id left join art46.adres_contact ac on br.adres_id = ac.adres_id and br.contact_id = ac.contact_id left join art46.v_dossier d on br.dossier_id = d.id left join art46.schuldvordering sv on br.brief_id = sv.brief_id where br.brief_id = #{briefid}
mapper.update: update art46.BRIEF set check_auteur_d = current date where brief_id = #{brief_id}
update art46.BRIEF set teprinten_jn = 'N', print_d = current date where brief_id = #{brief_id}
mapper.select: select DMS_ID FROM ART46.BRIEF where brief_id = #{briefId}

SELECT b.*, a.straat as adres_straat, a.gemeente as gemeente, a.naam as adresnaam, a.postcode as postcode FROM ART46.BRIEF b LEFT JOIN ART46.ADRES a ON b.ADRES_ID = a.ADRES_ID WHERE (b.dossier_id = #{dossierId} OR ( brief_id IN (SELECT brief_id FROM art46.DEELOPDRACHT_BRIEF WHERE deelopdracht_id IN (SELECT DEELOPDRACHT_ID FROM art46.DEELOPDRACHT WHERE dossier_id = #{dossierId}) ) ) ) and b.categorie_id != 6
AND (B.UIT_TYPE_ID_VOS = #{uitTypeIdVos})
AND (b.BESTEK_ID = #{bestekId})
AND (b.INSCHRIJF_D >= #{inschrijfVan})
AND (#{inschrijfTot} >= b.INSCHRIJF_D)
ORDER BY B.inschrijf_d desc

select bc.brief_categorie_id, bc.brief_categorie_b, bc.sort, bcbc.parent_brief_categorie_id from art46.brief_categorie bc left outer join art46.brief_categorie_brief_categorie bcbc on bc.brief_categorie_id = bcbc.child_brief_categorie_id where bc.brief_categorie_id = #{brief_categorie_id}

select rtrim(cast(parent.sort as char(10))) || '-0', case when parent.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID = 0 then '' else '+ ' || parent.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_B end as BRIEF_CATEGORIE_B, parent.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID, NULLIF(1,1) PARENT_BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID from ART46.BRIEF_CATEGORIE parent where parent.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID not in (select CHILD_BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID from ART46.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_BRIEF_CATEGORIE) and not (parent.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID = 18 and exists (select id from art46.v_dossier d where d.dossier_type != 'X' and d.id = #{dossier_id}) ) union select rtrim(cast(parent.sort as char(10))) || '-' || rtrim(cast(child.sort as char(10))), '+----- ' || child.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_B as BRIEF_CATEGORIE_B, child.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID, parent.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID as PARENT_BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID from ART46.BRIEF_CATEGORIE child inner join ART46.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_BRIEF_CATEGORIE koppeling on (koppeling.CHILD_BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID = child.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID) inner join ART46.BRIEF_CATEGORIE parent on (koppeling.PARENT_BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID = parent.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID) where not (child.BRIEF_CATEGORIE_ID = 18 and exists (select id from art46.v_dossier d where d.dossier_type != 'X' and d.id = #{dossier_id}) ) order by 1
mapper.sql: select br.brief_id, br.dossier_id, br.dossier_nr, br.dossier_id_boa, br.doss_hdr_id, br.nis_id, br.gemeente_b, br.brief_nr, br.inschrijf_d, br.in_d, br.uit_d, br.betreft, br.reactie_voor_d, br.reactie_d, br.uit_type_id_vos, br.uit_type_vos_b, br.in_aard_id, br.in_aard_b, br.uit_aard_id, br.uit_aard_b, case when (br.IN_AARD_ID is not null and br.IN_AARD_ID != 0) then br.IN_AARD_ID when (br.UIT_AARD_ID is not null and br.UIT_AARD_ID != 0) then br.UIT_AARD_ID else null end aard_id, case when (br.IN_AARD_ID is not null and br.IN_AARD_ID != 0) then 'In' when (br.UIT_AARD_ID is not null and br.UIT_AARD_ID != 0) then 'Uit' else null end in_uit_aard, case when (br.IN_AARD_ID is not null and br.IN_AARD_ID != 0) then br.in_aard_b when (br.UIT_AARD_ID is not null and br.UIT_AARD_ID != 0) then br.uit_aard_b else null end aard_b, br.brief_categorie_b, br.adres_id, br.adres_naam, br.qr_code from art46.v_brief br
mapper.select: select br.inschrijf_d, br.uit_d, br.uit_aard_b, br.uit_type_vos_b, br.brief_nr, br.dossier_nr, br.doss_hdr_id, br.gemeente_b, br.adres_naam, br.dms_folder, br.dms_filename from art46.v_brief as br where br.teprinten_jn = 'J' and br.uit_aard_id is not null and br.uit_aard_id != 0 and br.dms_id is not null order by br.dossier_id fetch first 500 rows only
mapper.sql: brief_id, opmerking, auteur, creatie_d, behandeld_d, verwijderd_jn, wijzig_user
mapper.select: select opmerking_id, , wijzig_ts from art46.brief_opmerking opm where verwijderd_jn ='N' and brief_id = #{brief_id} order by wijzig_ts desc
select opmerking_id, , wijzig_ts from art46.brief_opmerking opm where opmerking_id = #{opmerking_id}

select 'brief' as type, br.brief_id, br.brief_nr, br.dms_id, br.DMS_FILENAME, br.DMS_FOLDER from art46.brief br where 1 = 1 and br.parent_brief_id is null and br.DMS_ID is not null and br.BRIEF_ID = #{brief_id} union select 'scan' as type, br.brief_id, br.brief_nr, br.dms_id, br.DMS_FILENAME, br.DMS_FOLDER from art46.brief br where 1 = 1 and br.DMS_ID is not null and br.PARENT_BRIEF_ID = #{brief_id}
